name: Refrigerator LG GBB61BLHMN Black
origAbout: LinearCooling™ reduces temperature fluctuations, locking in the flavor of fresh for up to 7 days. Drinks are colder and food stays fresher with the even and faster performance of DoorCooling+™. DoorCooling+™ makes inside temperature more even and cools the refrigerator 35% faster than the conventional cooling system. This reduces the temperature gap between the inner part and the door side of the compartment; thus letting the food remain fresh for long. SmartThinQ™ - Cool Meets Smart - LG smart refrigerators let you control key features by using the LG ThinQ® app on your smartphone, or simple voice commands with the Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa.

details.name: Annual Energy Consumption (kW/Year), kilowatt per hour per Year
